main event: A witness reported seeing a brilliant light resembling a small ball changing size and moving at high speeds near Jefferson City, Missouri on April 7, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed at a height of less than 600 feet and made the witness's hands appear x-ray like., The witness stopped their car three times to observe the object, which was seen from three different locations., The sighting was reportedly confirmed by a pilot and officials at Ozark airport., The balloon explanation was rejected after a call with the witness, who knew the boys responsible for a prior prank involving balloons., The recording of the conversation regarding the sighting was garbled, leading to incomplete documentation.
sighted object: a brilliant light resembling a small ball
witness description: a witness who observed the object and had background knowledge of local individuals involved in balloon pranks
